records.summary: Very bright light in evening sky where neither a star nor planet should be and then 3 pulsating lights came through the trees.
records.story: Very bright light in evening sky where neither a star nor planet should be and then 3 pulsating lights came through the trees. My husband and I were walking up our driveway around 8:45pm, extremely quiet night & the sky was still bright.  We noticed a really bright stationary steady light (brighter than a planet) in the northeast sky.  No other stars or planets were out.  Just seemed out of place. It didn't move for about 10minutes (we were trying to figure if it was a planet or space station).  Also, it was not where a planet would be (calibrated StarWalk to moon & nothing bright should be there).  My husband was caught off guard & mentioned how it was changing colors.  Then, it disappeared.  We looked for it about 2-3 minutes and all of a sudden reappeared in same position (small light that got brighter and brighter until it was as bright as before..and there were no clouds to distort the view), stationary about 1 minute then IT STARTED MOVING northward (to the left) about the speed of a second hand on a watch. It moved, by perception, about 4 inches across sky then light just quickly phased out.   As soon as it disappeared again My husband saw a pulsating LED light which flashed 3 times, then paused, and flashed 3 times again (about 3 flashes in 2 seconds) coming thru the trees from southeast toward the west.  He mentioned there was a plane coming although there was no noise (we were still looking for the light in the sky).  He thought it was a plane until it stopped on our side of the treeline.  Brilliantly white bright light. Then I saw it.  It followed right under the top tree line (about 50 ft up).  When it got in front our trees but still in the branches, behind our house, then the lights started  going south to north following our tree line (sometimes a little lower in the tree line and then sometimes a little higher but was never lower than about 50 feet) until it got to the top of our  most northward tallest tree & then disappeared.  Just 3 flashing-then-pause-then flashing little but amazingly bright LED-like white lights.  I thought maybe a drone but there was absolutely no noise.  Plus, as my husband pointed out, it was too close into the trees. Please give some rational explanation.

records.summary: Pair of Silent V shaped objects with red-orange lights  flying low and slow over Raleigh, NC
records.story: Pair of Silent V shaped objects with red-orange lights  flying low and slow over Raleigh, NC On the evening of 4/15/2016, we were out to dinner with two other adults in Raleigh, NC. Upon arriving back in front of our home and saying our good nites to the other couple, some lights in the sky caught our attention.  There were two  noiseless objects with red orange lights flying low in the sky in tandem.  There was absolute silence, so they were definitely not helicopters.  The objects were V-shaped with what appeared to be headlights on the front.  Their speed was slower than a helicopter or any plane that has flown over this residential neighborhood.  They never waivered from their path.  We all watched them until they they were no longer visible.  We all agreed this was nothing we had ever seen before(and yes we were all sober).  The other couple left us and later in the week when we spoke again, they reported they saw 2 more of the same objects traveling in the night sky as they neared their residence.

records.summary: 4 greenish-blue lights rotating around a red light, brief "meteor-like" sighting
records.story: 4 greenish-blue lights rotating around a red light, brief "meteor-like" sighting Driving along 64 Westbound, about 1 mile east of Raleigh East Airport (W17).  Saw a bright greenish-blue light (with a slight trail) appear about 10 degrees over the horizon (nearly directly west), RAPIDLY moving downward to the ground and disappearing.  I assumed this was a meteor and made a joke about it being either a meteor, a missile or an UFO. Within 10-20 seconds of this, the light reappeared at an elevation of about 40 degrees, still west of us.  It appeared to be a series of 4 extremely bright greenish-blue lights forming a circle around a dim red light.  The 4 lights were rapidly rotating around the red light (at ~15 RPM).  This object rose rapidly, made a turn to the right (north) and suddenly shot back down to the earth (nearly identical to the original sighting but at MUCH closer range). Distance, size and speed is hard to calculate at night (and with an object of unknown size).  That said, the speed at which the object moved was roughly that of a fast moving meteor burning up in the atmosphere.  The object was also much larger on the second sighting, so I'd assume that we were much closer.

records.story: Object 300 meter in the air crossing the sky like a rocket opens the walls of earth and explodes into thin air leaving just a trial At about 5:15 am on 8/13/2016, just before the sunrise, about 300 meters in the air above highway 40 an object cross the sky at the speed of a rocket.  My first thought was to be afraid fearing that it was a missel of some kind however certain things happen in the course of 30 seconds that were beyond human capabilities in my opinion.  This option let behind it a trial of what appeared to be smoke similar to what a jet does as it crosses the sky only this option was moving so fast it appeared to be opening the earth around it.  When it reached what seemed to be its peak it exploded into thin air.  It look like I had just seen a black circler option open the walls of earth n disappear.  I had to share this with someone because the trail of smoke remained in the air for a few seconds after the object exploded into thin air.  I'm a truck driver I see things shoot a cross the air all the time but I've never seen anything like this before in my life it seem impossible what I witnessed.

I was inside so I’m not sure if there was a clear sound.  Either way it looked like a normal plane.  I first noticed it flying out of the southwest and it continued to fly into the northwestern part of the sky.   Suddenly, I noticed a second flying object and it wasn’t leaving a contrail, it just flew into the area i happened to be looking at from a lower altitude.  The second object appeared white but it may have been a different color since stuff up high usually looks lighter than what it really is but it looked kinda like a pill shape and continued to fly into the contrails of the airplane quickly.  It wasn’t flying abrutly but it was making maneuvers that I think would be difficult for a plane to make.   Then both of the objects moved out of my line of sight. records.story: White cigar shaped UFO flew over small patch of sky I was watching at 7:28 AM I was boredly watching the sky, waiting for the bus.  The sky was only a patch, not a big open area. Since I'm an astronomy lover, I thought to myself, "What if I saw a UFO?".  I had seen an assumed UFO two years back, but it didn't look anything like this one.   Anyways, I suddenly noticed this one white, shortish cigar object flying across the patch of sky slightly faster than a plane.  The other people around were busy socializing.  I narrowed my eyes, hearing my heart thump in my chest as I grew more excited.   I grabbed my phone, and the cigar-shaped object was almost out of view.  I opened my camera as fast as I could, but it was too late, as the object had already flown out of view. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Dark cylinder hanging motionless in the sky near a jet.
records.story: Dark cylinder hanging motionless in the sky near a jet. This sighting took place somewhere in North or Northeast Raleigh, North Carolina. I lived there with my girlfriend at the time for a short while and since I rarely ventured out of the house, I was unfamiliar with the area, so I'll try to give my best recollection involving where we might have been when I saw this UFO. We're traveling in my girlfriend's car on what I believe was Spring of 2012.  She was driving. I'm in the passenger seat and there was no one else besides us in the car.  As we're moving I was looking at all the scenery and it was a beautiful day.  In my peripheral vision, I noticed a large passenger jet somewhat high in the sky.  The jet wasn't low. I'd wager it was flying at roughly 10-20,000 feet. That's when I saw it. Just in front of the jet's path looked to what I can only describe as an Oil Drum or a dark, almost black-looking cylinder, upright like an oil drum.  Now it was hard to tell but it looked like it was up there really close to this jet which was heading towards it. The windows in the car were up so I heard no noise.  It just seemed to hang there, motionless in the sky.  I was excited so I told my girlfriend and she wanted to see it and asked where it was.  I said, "It's up there, by that plane!"  Unfortunately, she couldn't look as she was driving.  I probably looked at this thing for about a minute, no more.  As we drove some trees blocked my view.  We pulled up to a traffic light and that's when I looked up again only this time all I could see was the jet and no cylinder. To give an idea of the sizes of this jet and cylinder, at arm's length, the jet would have been about the size of my thumb and the cylinder was about 1/3 that size.  I wish I could give more information but the sighting was brief. Just one last thing.  As I said, I was unfamiliar with the area, but I know we used to live a mile west of Route 1, a.k.a. (Capital Blvd).  We lived off of Durant road between Capital Blvd. and Falls of Neuse Rd.  The sighting was not too far from this area.  I wish I could tell you the name of the road we were on, but all I can tell you is we were no more than 5 miles from our house on our way to get a burger from this great little burger and hotdog place where you walk up to the window and they take your order.  When it's ready they call your number, go up to the window, get your food, and then we would just sit in our car and eat.  That's the best description I can give as, yet again, I can't remember the name of the place!

records.summary: 3 lights single object.
records.story: 3 lights single object Saw 3 lights moving in unison, slowly in the same direction over my neighborhood. It was heading West. 3 lights blinking one at a time from West to East. Light blinking repeated once a second in total for all 3 lights blinking in a loop - 1,2,3 - 1,2,3  No engine sounds.  Looked extremely wide/long from our view. The light's rate of blinking sort of looks like normal aircraft.  Only there were 3 lights, and all 3 lights moved together, and their blinking pattern was synced up as if highlighting a single shape.  Unclear if disc/chevron/whatever. If it was 3 helicopters, they did a really good job going at the same speed in the same direction, really really slow.  I've seen normal helicopters flying over my house before.  Lights look different, and I can hear the engines. Only other simplified guess I can make is some kids tied 3 drones together with a really really long fishing line.  I wouldn't be surprised if it was more than 1 to 3 miles long.  I'm no pilot or anything.  So my ability to judge the distance/speed/size is based on only my understanding that a traffic light is as big as I am close up. Uploaded video to youtube:  https://youtu.be/pr8p7LcCZ5M
